description: GraphQL API Overview - RED Metrics (Rate, Errors, Duration) with per-operation breakdown

targets.expr: topk(10, histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (le, graphql_operation_name) (rate(app_duration_milliseconds_bucket{service_name=~"$service", graphql_operation_name!="", graphql_operation_name=~"$operation"}[$__rate_interval]))))

100 * sum by (graphql_operation_name) (rate(app_calls_total{service_name=~"$service", graphql_operation_name!="", graphql_operation_name=~"$operation", status_code="STATUS_CODE_ERROR"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (graphql_operation_name) (rate(app_calls_total{service_name=~"$service", graphql_operation_name!="", graphql_operation_name=~"$operation"}[$__rate_interval]))
